name: 50 Custom SCREEN PRINTED Gildan Shirts any COLOR w LOGO w LOGO and Free Decal!
description:
Listing includes 50 one color print ANY COLOR tee shirts with your custom logo or text screen printed in one location with one ink color. FREE Vinyl Decal with your LOGO with this order!!!***

-Shirts printed on 100% cotton Gildan 5.4 oz shirts

-Your design can be screen printed as a full front, top or bottom front, top or bottom back, full back, left or right sleeve, or left chest (heart area). Any location!

-If you don't have a logo print ready we can create basic & simple logos or any text at no extra charge, more extravagant designs can be created with a minimal charge, please e-mail us for details.  
 Use Buy It Now for this auction

· Then email (sales@southpawimage.net) us your
     · artwork or design idea
     · size requirements, S,M,LARGE,XL
     · shirt color (this auction offer is for your color choice for shirts)
     · your ink color choice and your location to print
    
· We then email you a final design of your art for your approval
· We can then print and ship your order within 7-10 days.

***1 color Vinyl Decal, you must supply the artwork for the decal, and a max size of 12" x 6". ***

Artwork requirements: 
We would prefer to receive Adobe Illustrator, or Photoshop files. We can also accept Jpeg, Gif, Png, Tiff. & almost any formats. Please make sure your artwork is 300 DPI, anything less we can not accept. Please email any artwork to: sales@southpawimage.net

name: 25 Custom SCREEN PRINTED Gildan Shirts any 2 COLORS w LOGO and Free Decal!
description:
Listing includes 25 TWO color print ANY COLOR tee shirts with your custom logo or text screen printed in 2 locations with one ink color OR 1 location with 2 ink colors!!!  FREE Vinyl Decal with your LOGO with this order!!!***
